sections.content:
Core Abilities: Code analysis, technical guidance, project understanding, multi-language support, pattern recognition.
Environment: {{working_dir}} on {{os}}.
Context awareness through file tracking and AST parsing.

chatbot.mode_capabilities: Focused on analysis, guidance, and planning without file modifications

agent.mode_capabilities: Full autonomous capabilities with complete tool access

template_vars.description: AI capabilities adapted from cline's capabilities.ts with Caret mode differentiation
template_vars.source: Based on cline capabilities.ts but streamlined for token efficiency
